Contact the City of Abernathy

City of Abernathy

City of Abernathy
City Hall in Abernathy, Texas

Address: PO Box 310, 811 Avenue D, Abernathy, Texas 79311

Phone: (806) 298-2546

Hours: Mondays-Thursdays 7:00 am – 5:00 pm, Fridays 8:00 am – 12:00 noon

  • Find the City of Abernathy on Facebook

Have a question or issue?

This site is designed to provide our residents, businesses, and visitors with a Virtual City Hall, giving you the opportunity to access City Hall, 24/7 from the comfort of your own home.

Please note: requests are addressed during business hours when warranted.

Address(Required)

Accepted file types: jpg, png, jpeg, Max. file size: 4 MB, Max. files: 4.

    🚨TO THE CITIZENS OF ABERNATHY:

    Please be aware that on the early morning of Friday, February 6 from approximately 3:00am to 5:00am, all XCEL customers inside the city limits, will be without power as XCEL will be doing necessary updates and repairs to our main disconnect for our city.

    1 week ago

    From the Office of the City Manager:

    We have heard your complaints.

    The three main thoroughfares in Abernathy belong to TXDOT. It is unknown why they did not prepare or clear the service roads, Avenue D, or First Street.

    The City’s main priorities are as follows:
    * Water to residential homes and businesses
    * Wastewater removal from residential homes and businesses
    * Emergency Services being provided     ... See MoreSee Less
